subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[torrential]]
# [[voluminous]]
# {{zh-div|母}} {{lb|zh|phonology}} a [[Middle Chinese]] [[initial]] and the [['Phags-pa]] script letter [[ꡍ]] (ph-)

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) proscribes the use of the pronunciation {{m|cmn|páng}}.
